byline.original: By ERIC LICHTBLAU and NOAH WEILAND

abstract: Hacker working under pseudonym Guccifer 2.0 makes public set of internal Democratic Party documents that contain personal contact information of almost 200 lawmakers; hacker is believed to have ties to Russian intelligence services and appears eager to taunt Democrats, indicating more leaks will be made available in future.
lead_paragraph: “Guccifer 2.0,” believed to have ties to Russia, claimed responsibility for the breach, which included lawmakers’ personal cellphone numbers and email addresses.
snippet: “Guccifer 2.0,” believed to have ties to Russia, claimed responsibility for the breach, which included lawmakers’ personal cellphone numbers and email addresses....

headline.main: Hacker Releases More Democratic Party Documents
headline.print_headline: Hacker Releases More Democratic Party Files, Renewing Fears of Russian Meddling
